channel.title: modern data stack on Logotyp.us
channel.description: Recent content in modern data stack on Logotyp.us

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
DataBrain Logo The modern data stack has evolved drastically. My first ever job involved writing scripts to ftp csv files over the server. We’ve come a long way since then. Now we can easily commission pipelines with tools like Fivetran, perform transformations with dbt, do reverse ETL with hightouch, all with just a few clicks and some SQL. Source
You can download theDataBrainlogo on full-version of the page. ]] >
item.title: DataBrain
item.description: The modern data stack has evolved drastically. My first ever job involved writing scripts to ftp csv files over the server. We’ve come a long way since then. Now we can easily commission pipelines with tools like Fivetran, perform transformations with dbt, do reverse ETL with hightouch, all with just a few clicks and some SQL. Source
